description: <p>At Nuffield Health, everything we do is dedicated to helping people to make the most of their lives. With a unique approach to complete health and wellbeing we bring together diagnosis and treatment with prevention and fitness services across one, groundbreaking network. And our not for profit status means that people - our patients and members, and our colleagues - always come first. Join us, and we’ll help you make the most of your time, both in and outside of work.<br /><br />As a valuable member of the team, you will enjoy the variety of working within different specialist areas within Radiology and you’ll do it in an innovative, clean, modern working environment. You will benefit from support and training opportunities, plus the time and patient ratio that ensures quality of care. Participation in the on call rota is required. <br /><br />CT skills would be advantageous but not essential. <br /><br />In return, you can expect a competitive benefits package including a choice of pension plans, private healthcare, Gym membership, childcare vouchers and free car parking.<br /><br />Nuffield Health is Britain’s largest and most pioneering healthcare charity, integrating fitness and well-being, prevention and cure. We’ve brought together our hospitals, clinics, fitness & wellbeing centres as well as our diagnostic units into one holistic healthcare service provided from over 200 locations. A not-for-profit organisation, we reinvest every penny we make into helping the people of Britain to lead healthier, happier lives. In today’s healthcare market, we’re in an enviably strong position.</p>
title: Radiographer
